document.full_text: a visiting senior united states senator warned pakistanis on monday that members of congress were asking "tough questions" about economic aid to islamabad after osama bin laden was killed on pakistani soil.
document.title: john kerry warns pakistan over bin laden
lines_and_colors: a visiting senior united states senator warned pakistanis on monday that members of congress were asking "tough questions" about economic aid to islamabad after osama bin laden was killed on pakistani soil.
